name: Darkum - Angels & Demons
description:
An open world RPG made using rpg maker with alot of features

-custom scripts - better battle UI and Experience with non default rpg maker battle system

-over 40+ original custom items, armor, weapons

-A huge world to explore, aswell as heaven and hell

-Map system

-Travel System

-over 4 different cities to visit

-hidden easter eggs

-end game content

Darkum is 80% finished and the campaign is fully playable and theres full end game content, however I will be updating the game frequently to add more areas, items, enemies etc.

Darkum plays on all Windows computers from Windows XP to current ( Windows 10)
